copying an aray.explanation: The contents of the numbers were expanded and thrown out of the array and it is covered by new array. Then it is assigned to nnumbersCopy array

merge two arrays.explanation: The contents of the arr1, arr2 were expanded and thrown out of the array and it is covered by new array. Then it is assigned to output array

maximum value of an array.explanation: The contents of the arr were expanded and thrown out of the array and it is passed to the Math.max function to get the maximum value from the array

minimum value of an array.explanation: The contents of the arr were expanded and thrown out of the array and it is passed to the Math.min function to get the minimum value from the array

first index of an element.explanation: indexof method returns the first index of a given element

last index of an element.explanation: lastIndexOf method returns the last index of a given element

filter an array.code:
let arr = [4, 2, 5, 6, 3];
let filteredArr = arr.filter((ele) => ele %2 === 0); // [4, 2, 6]
filter an array.explanation: filter method returns the new filtered array based on our condition(Example: Remove Odd Number)

find the particular element.explanation: find method returns the first element based on our condition(Example: element should be son)
